ActJudges Act
SubjectLorraine Mercier ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Pierre Mercier **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to LORRAINE MERCIER, widow of the Hon. Pierre Mercier, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective June 5, 2016.
